summary: Belgrade, Yugoslavia, 1979. While Yugoslav president Tito is in Cuba settling international matters, a mysterious Phantom occupies the attention and hearts of Belgrade. Every night, he ... See full summary »
cast: Marko Zivic|Radoslav 'Rale' Milenkovic|Nada Macankovic|Andrej Sepetkovski|Aleksandar Djurica|Milos Samolov|Goran Radakovic|Uros Urosevic|Boris Komnenic|Bojan Lazarov|Petar Mihailovic|Predrag Damnjanovic|Milutin Milosevic|Milos Vlalukin|Cvijeta Mesic|Srdjan Radosavljevic
title: The Belgrade Phantom
